subject: [Ip-health] Literature on the Use of Patents in Public Private  Partnerships
body:
Greetings,
I was wondering whether anybody out there has come across academic literature on the use of patents in public-private partnerships (either in Agriculture or health research).Kindly e-mail me privately.
Regards,
chikosa
